post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Title:         Mobile Developer - Android
Company:         Hireglyphics Inc.
Position Type:         Contract to Hire
Pay Rate:         TBD
Skills:         Android, Brew, Blackberry, Mobile Web Development, Java, iPhone
Date Posted:         Mar-09-10

ShareThis

Located in Toronto, this position requires a Developer responsible to work on the development and testing of mobile applications.

Skills & Experience:

• 5 years + Software Engineering
• 2 years + of development working with mobile devices/applications
• 2 years + of experience in Mobile software architect discipline
• Expert in one of: J2ME, Windows Mobile 6.1 and/or 6.5, Brew or Blackberry development
• Additional experience with either Android SDK, iPhone SDK, or Palm SDK would be a bonus
• Experience using development IDEs, Netbeans, Visual Studio
• Clear understanding of difference between desktop and mobile development
• Experience in WebServices, SOAP, XML
• Any experience on Wireless Connectivity technologies would be a bonus
• Experience with various mobile manufacture products -- Blackberry, Samsung, Nokia, LG, Motorola, HTC, iPhone, Sony Ericsson, Palm
• Excellent organizational skills with the ability to effectively manage multiple projects
• Excellent problem solving and analytical skills is a must
• Ability to work with very little supervision as well as with diverse teams of employees at all levels.


Responsibilities:

• Participate in Mobile platform development and porting
• Partake in requirements and project scope discussions.
• Participating in technical specifications development.
• Develop source code to comply with our client's policies.
• Provide unit testing for own code.
• Calculate necessary product source code metrics and report weekly activity.
• Provide post-release support for product.
• Participate in 3rd level of customer escalation and hotfix activities.


• BS in Engineering or Science or equivalent experience in computer science field.
Location:         Canada-ON-Toronto
Telecommute:         No (Onsite Position)
Contact Name:        Michael
Contact Phone:         416-583-2030 x 2004
Contact Email:        mmccreadie@hireglyphics.com
URL:        http://www.hireglyphics.com
